Mace is currently providing programme management and looking for high-calibre Mace is currently providing programme management and looking for high-calibre experienced people. We are hiring an ambitious and forward-thinking senior planning manager to join our established and growing team in Saudi.The role needs to have the ability to play a key role in multidisciplinary teams and take a lead role in creating plans or analysing trends using numerical and statistical techniques. To supervise and manage a team of professionals delivering planning/schedule management services and is responsible for staff development.Your responsibilities will include:Directing the application of specific planning/scheduling methods, techniques and tools. 
Advising on complex requirements and communicating analysis and corrective measures effectively. 
Managing the planning/scheduling delivery of medium/high projects/programmes. 
Providing effective and timely advice to clients. 
Understanding of data management. 
Understanding the role and future career paths available from that position. 
Providing excellent attention to detail and ability to validate and check schedule management inputs, recording and reports produced, providing basic commentary and analysis.About youWith a relevant degree qualification, you will take personal development seriously and be chartered or pursuing a similar level of professional qualification.You are digitally savvy, can build lasting client relationships and lead strong, motivated teams.
